channel.title: Nodejs on Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Nodejs on Portfolio

item.title: D-Bot
item.description: Introduction   Developed for Software Engineering during my time at university, D-Bot exists to act as an Open-Source template for modern discord bots utilizing newfound slash commands. Organization   The project consisted of 5 Software Engineers, Assistant Project Manager & Project Manager. Early efforts   As one of the Software Engineers, I took on the role as lead of backend development and began developing the bot’s initial commands and functionality, as well as implementing designs and the concepts for viewing user levels, API integration, Database Schema design, and deployment to Heroku.
